question: Which of the following was the theme of the 23rd National Youth Festival, 2020?
option3: India Youth for Skill, Development and Harmony
explanation: The theme of the 23rd National Youth Festival, 2020 was Fit Youth, Fit India. It was commenced on January 12th-16th. The venue of the 23rd National Youth Festival, 2020 was Lucknow (Indira Pratishthan). National Youth Day is celebrated every year on 12th January (Swami Vivekananda's birthday).
